meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>group</kanji> of <kanji>folding fan</kanji>s, no matter how big it gets, is still a <vocabulary>fan</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic:
The reading for 団 is an exceptional reading. It's the same as 内's reading so you can think about how a group of folding fans to make a big fan is just a bunch of fans inside of fans.

The reading for 扇 is also an exceptional reading. Imagine a <reading>wa</reading>lrus (わ) using the 内 fan.
